text: Today is October 31,2020 15:51. I'm writing in the presence of the glass. It's in front of me on the table. It's 2 centimeters away from the sheet of paper I'm writing on. There is a lamp on the wall just nearby. The light is on.
I was sure it would be worse today. But I've been feeling well inside myself. That's confusing.
I've developed a program that controls my day minute by minute. I've got 2 minutes to get myself dressed and brushed before it's time to consume food.
It seems there is something in my nose. And there is also some tightness in my throat.
